title: Nabila Full Mattress
description:
The Nabila Futon Mattress features a cover made of Poplin Fabric and blended cotton filling both offering a soft and even texture; Its reversible feature is the perfect complement for any futon frame, can be used regularly as bed or couch cushion. Available in several colors from which may choose according to your preference.

title: Opal Full Mattress
description:
The Opal mattress collection includes 3 construction layers: 1st layer includes 2" quick recovery cool memory foam; 2nd layer offers 2" comfort Foam and the 3rd layer 6" quick recovery base support foam. It's complemented by Infused Gel Particles that absorbs heat for a cooler and more comfortable feel.
